wentWell.title: Strong team collaboration on authentication feature
wentWell.details: The team successfully shipped OAuth login with 6 PRs merged and comprehensive test coverage. Alice and Bob worked effectively together with quick code reviews.

wentWell.title: Improved deployment velocity
wentWell.details: Team deployed to production 3 times this sprint with zero rollbacks. The new CI caching reduced build times by 40%.

wentWell.title: Effective async communication
wentWell.details: Daily standups were consistently posted with 100% team participation. Quick response times on critical issues in Slack.

wentWell.title: Successful feature completion ahead of schedule
wentWell.details: Login form validation feature completed 2 days early with extensive test coverage. Both unit and integration tests added.

wentWell.title: Proactive technical debt reduction
wentWell.details: Team refactored authentication middleware without being asked, improving code maintainability and reducing complexity by 30%.

wentWell.title: Excellent cross-team coordination
wentWell.details: Platform and Core teams collaborated seamlessly on the messaging infrastructure, with regular sync-ups and shared documentation.

wentWell.title: Rapid incident response and resolution
wentWell.details: Team responded to production issue within 15 minutes, deployed fix in under an hour. Great example of operational excellence.

wentWell.title: Knowledge sharing through documentation
wentWell.details: 5 new technical docs created this sprint, including API guides and architecture decisions. Team actively maintaining knowledge base.

wentWell.title: Consistent code quality standards
wentWell.details: All PRs passed automated quality checks on first attempt. Team adhering to coding standards and linting rules effectively.

wentWell.title: Successful onboarding of new team member
wentWell.details: Dana joined the team and made their first production contribution within 3 days. Excellent mentoring from senior developers.

wentWell.title: Sprint goals achieved with high quality
wentWell.details: 100% of committed story points delivered with no critical bugs reported. Team estimation accuracy improving significantly.

wentWell.title: Effective use of feature flags
wentWell.details: Team successfully rolled out 3 features using feature flags, enabling safe, gradual rollouts with instant rollback capability.

didntGoWell.title: Large pull requests slowing reviews
didntGoWell.details: Several PRs exceeded 800 lines of changes, making thorough reviews difficult. PR #124 with 900 lines is still pending review after 3 days.

didntGoWell.title: High priority bug lingered in backlog
didntGoWell.details: Critical message broker race condition (urgent priority) remained unresolved for over a week despite being assigned.

didntGoWell.title: CI pipeline instability
didntGoWell.details: Multiple mentions of 'flaky CI' and 'blocked' in team communications. Node 18 builds failing intermittently.

didntGoWell.title: Insufficient test coverage on new features
didntGoWell.details: Several new components shipped without unit tests. Overall test coverage dropped from 78% to 72% this sprint.

didntGoWell.title: Delayed code reviews blocking progress
didntGoWell.details: Average PR review time increased to 48 hours. Some developers blocked waiting for reviews, impacting sprint velocity.

didntGoWell.title: Unplanned work disrupting sprint
didntGoWell.details: 40% of sprint capacity consumed by unplanned urgent requests. Original sprint commitments at risk.

didntGoWell.title: Technical debt accumulating in legacy modules
didntGoWell.details: Refactoring backlog growing with 12 identified areas needing attention. Team postponing cleanup work due to feature pressure.

didntGoWell.title: Inconsistent commit message formatting
didntGoWell.details: 30% of commits not following conventional commit standards, making changelog generation and history tracking difficult.

didntGoWell.title: Production deployment windows missed
didntGoWell.details: 2 scheduled deployments postponed due to last-minute issues discovered. Need better pre-deployment validation.

didntGoWell.title: Insufficient monitoring on new services
didntGoWell.details: New microservices deployed without proper alerting setup. Potential issues might go unnoticed in production.

didntGoWell.title: Knowledge silos forming in specialized areas
didntGoWell.details: OAuth implementation only understood by 2 team members. Bus factor risk for critical authentication system.

didntGoWell.title: Meeting overload reducing coding time
didntGoWell.details: Developers reporting 35% of time in meetings, up from 20% last sprint. Impact on feature delivery velocity.

actionItems.title: Implement PR size guidelines
actionItems.details: Set up automated checks to warn when PRs exceed 400 lines. Encourage breaking down large changes into smaller, focused PRs.

actionItems.title: Address CI reliability issues
actionItems.details: Investigate Node 18 build failures and implement retry logic for transient failures. Consider upgrading dependencies.

actionItems.title: Review and prioritize urgent bugs weekly
actionItems.details: Add weekly bug triage meeting to ensure high-priority issues don't stagnate. Set SLA for urgent bug resolution.
